description:
Murasame Soushun is an Ultimate Student Council President. A known predecessor of his title is http://anidb.net/ch83116 [Munakata Kyousuke].
He was the only survivor of The Tragedy of Hope`s Peak Academy, along with http://anidb.net/ch84377 [Izuru]. During the incident, he had sustained a head injury and fell in a comatose-like, unresponsive state.
name: Murasame Soushun
